akn:subsection.akn:heading: Losses by individual from sequestered credits; loss by banks or other financial institutions

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Losses by individual from sequestered credits; loss by banks or other financial institutions
(b) Filing date for claims Claims must be filed under this section within one year after August 31, 1954.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Death or legal disability as affecting payments

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Death or legal disability as affecting payments Where any individual entitled to payment under this section is under any legal disability, payment may be made in accordance with the provisions of subsection (e) of section 4104 of this title. In the case of the death of any individual entitled to payment of any claim under this section, payment of such claim shall be made to the individuals specified, and in the order provided, in subsection (d) of section 4105 of this title; except that no payment shall be made under this section to any individual who voluntarily, knowingly, and without duress, gave aid to or collaborated with or in any manner served any government hostile to the United States during World War II.
